mapper.insert: insert into sys_component_message (id, userid, container, x, y, h, i,w) values (uuid(), #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{container,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{x,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{y,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{h,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{i,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{w,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update sys_component_message set userid = #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, container = #{container,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, x = #{x,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, y = #{y,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, h = #{h,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, i = #{i,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, w = #{w,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update sys_component_message set container = #{container,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, x = #{x,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, y = #{y,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, h = #{h,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, i = #{i,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, w = #{w,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where userid = #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and container = #{container}
mapper.select: select id, userid, container, x, y, h, i, w from sys_component_message
select id, userid, container, x, y, h, i, w from sys_component_message where userid = #{userid} and container = #{container}
select id, userid, container, x, y, h, i, w from sys_component_message where container = #{container}
